content.name: UT CaC Option - Collector Stations
content.description: Adds Collector Drones to Equipment Options of CVs and Stations which will be used by the CaC Manager locally
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Option - Collector Stations
text.description: Adds Collector Drones to Equipment Options of CVs and Stations which will be used by the CaC Manager locally
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Option - Sammler-Station
text.description: Fügt Gassammler-Drohnen in die Ausrüstoptionen von Bauschiff und Stationen ein, die dan von einem CaC-Manager lokal verwendet werden.
text.author: UniTrader
